mapper.select: SELECT ec.id as id,ec.`title` as title,ed.`description` as description,es.`title`as subjectLevelTwo,es2.`title` as subjectLevelOne ,et.`id` as teacherId, et.`name` as teacherName,et.avatar as avatar,et.intro as intro, ec.`lesson_num` as lessonNum,ec.`cover` as cover ,ec.`price` as price FROM `edu_course` ec LEFT JOIN `edu_course_description` ed ON ec.`id`=ed.`id` LEFT JOIN `edu_subject` es ON ec.`subject_id`=es.`id` LEFT JOIN `edu_subject` es2 ON ec.`subject_parent_id`=es2.`id` LEFT JOIN `edu_teacher` et ON ec.`teacher_id`=et.`id` WHERE is_deleted=0 and ec.id=#{id}

SELECT ec.id as id,ec.`title` as title,ec.`buy_count` as buyCount,ec.`view_count` as viewCount, ec.status as status,ed.`description` as description,es2.`title`as subjectLevelTwo,es.`title` as subjectLevelOne ,et.`name` as teacherName, ec.`lesson_num` as lessonNum,ec.`cover` as cover ,ec.`price` as price,ec.`gmt_modified` as gmtModified FROM `edu_course` ec LEFT JOIN `edu_course_description` ed ON ec.`id`=ed.`id` LEFT JOIN `edu_subject` es ON ec.`subject_parent_id`=es.`id` LEFT JOIN `edu_subject` es2 ON ec.`subject_id`=es2.`id` LEFT JOIN `edu_teacher` et ON ec.`teacher_id`=et.`id` ${ew.customSqlSegment}
